Trophy.Title: Congratulations!
Trophy.Description: You got all of the MLB® 12 The Show™ Trophies!

Trophy.Title: Million Dollar Arm
Trophy.Description: In any game mode, throw a perfect game against a CPU contolled team. Must be done in a full, uninterrupted, 9 inning game.

Trophy.Title: Winning
Trophy.Description: Hit 10 consecutive home runs in Home Run Derby™.

Trophy.Title: King Slayer
Trophy.Description: In Exhibition Mode, beat the team that is ranked first overall in the team select screen with Pitching and Batting difficulties set to Legend. Must be done in a full, uninterrupted, 9 inning game.

Trophy.Title: Sooo Close!
Trophy.Description: Lose your shot at a perfect game or no hitter in the 9th inning. Must be done against a CPU controlled team.

Trophy.Title: For the Greater Good
Trophy.Description: In any game mode, get a broken bat base hit.

Trophy.Title: Contact Killer
Trophy.Description: In any mode excluding RttS, play an entire 9 inning game without striking out. Must be done in a full, uninterrupted, 9 inning game against a CPU controlled team.

Trophy.Title: Quality Start
Trophy.Description: Throw more than 70% first pitch strikes in a complete game victory. Must be done in a full, uninterrupted, 9 inning game against a CPU controlled team.

Trophy.Title: Rally Killer
Trophy.Description: In any game mode, hit into 2 double plays in a game with the same player. Must be done against a CPU controlled team.

Trophy.Title: Meatball Buffet
Trophy.Description: Bat around in an inning. Must be completed on All-Star or higher Batting difficulty. Must be done in a full, uninterrupted, 9 inning game against a CPU controlled team.

Trophy.Title: Solid D
Trophy.Description: Using Pure Analog Throwing, with throwing difficulty set to All-Star or higher, complete a 9 inning game without an error. Must be done against a CPU controlled team.

Trophy.Title: Don't Phase Me Bro
Trophy.Description: In any game mode, hit a home run off a 100+ MPH pitch. Must be done against a CPU controlled team.

Trophy.Title: Early Exit
Trophy.Description: In any game mode, knock out the opponent's starting pitcher before the end of the 3rd inning. Must be done against a CPU controlled team.

Trophy.Title: Zone Plus Analog Blast
Trophy.Description: With hitting difficulty set to All-Star or harder, hit a home run using Zone Plus Analog controls. This trophy is not unlockable in Home Run Derby™ modes.

Trophy.Title: Pulsating
Trophy.Description: With the pitching difficulty set to All-Star or higher, use Pulse Pitching to strike out the side. Must be done against a CPU controlled team.

Trophy.Title: Back, Back, Back, Back, Back...
Trophy.Description: Hit a home run of 490ft or more in Home Run Derby™.

Trophy.Title: Run Benjie, Run!
Trophy.Description: Steal a base with a player whose primary position is Catcher. Must be done against a CPU controlled team.

Trophy.Title: In The Bag!
Trophy.Description: As the batter, hit 1st, 2nd, or 3rd base with the ball. Trophy is not achievable in Home Run Derby™.

Trophy.Title: Cruzball
Trophy.Description: Playing as the pitcher in any game mode, intentionally walk a batter, then turn a double play. Must be done against a CPU controlled team.

Trophy.Title: Squeezeball
Trophy.Description: In any game mode, win the game with an RBI bunt. Must be done in a full, uninterrupted, 9 inning game against a CPU controlled team.

Trophy.Title: Plowman
Trophy.Description: As a baserunner, plow the catcher. Must be done against a CPU controlled team.

Trophy.Title: "RESPECT THE GAME!"
Trophy.Description: In any game mode, enter a game with a mismatching uniform.

Trophy.Title: Don't Try That Again
Trophy.Description: On defense, throw a runner out at 3B or home plate from the outfield. Must be done against a CPU controlled team.

Trophy.Title: Sombrero Dealer
Trophy.Description: In any mode, strike out the same player four times in a game. Must be done against a CPU controlled team.

Trophy.Title: Vulture a Win
Trophy.Description: In any mode, blow a save and get the win with the same pitcher. Must be done in a full, uninterrupted, 9 inning game against a CPU controlled team.

Trophy.Title: The Old Fashioned Way
Trophy.Description: In any mode, earn a save by having your reliever pitch the last 3 innings of a win. Must be done in a full, uninterrupted, 9 inning game against a CPU controlled team.

Trophy.Title: You Blew It
Trophy.Description: In any mode, blow your opponents save opportunity. Must be done against a CPU controlled team.

Trophy.Title: Take Out Your Rival
Trophy.Description: In any mode, hit the opposing pitcher with a pitch.

Trophy.Title: Loud and Clear
Trophy.Description: Hit a home run into the speaker in center field at Dodger Stadium™. (LAD)

Trophy.Title: Go Chasin' Waterfalls
Trophy.Description: Hit a home run into a waterfall at Kauffman Stadium™. (KC)

Trophy.Title: Texas Two-Step
Trophy.Description: Hit a home run onto Greene's Hill in CF at Rangers Ballpark In Arlington™. (TEX)

Trophy.Title: Deep Dish
Trophy.Description: Hit a home run into the Bullpen Sports Grill in rightfield at U.S. Cellular Field™. (CWS)

Trophy.Title: Fish off a Barrel
Trophy.Description: Hit the aquarium behind home plate at Marlins Park™. (MIA)

Trophy.Title: On The Beach
Trophy.Description: Hit a home run into the sand area in Petco Park™. (SD)

Trophy.Title: You're the Man!
Trophy.Description: Reach 500 XP in online play.

Trophy.Title: Mr. 300
Trophy.Description: Reach 300 XP in online play.
